SEARCH
Module org.jaspr.hr.demo
Package org.jaspr.hr.demo

Class OllamaResponseFetcher

java.lang.Object
org.jaspr.hr.demo.OllamaResponseFetcher
public class OllamaResponseFetcher extends Object
Handles communication with the Ollama API server by sending prompts and receiving responses using HTTP POST requests. Includes synchronous and asynchronous fetch methods.

      public OllamaResponse fetchOllamaResponse(String model, String prompt)
      Constructs a prompt request and sends it to the Ollama API synchronously.
      Parameters:
      model - the model name to use
      prompt - the prompt string to send
      Returns:
      the parsed OllamaResponse, or null on failure

    • fetchAsynchronousOllamaResponse

      public void fetchAsynchronousOllamaResponse(String model, String prompt, ResponseListener responseListener)
      Sends the given prompt to the Ollama API asynchronously and invokes the provided callback.
      Parameters:
      model - the model name to use
      prompt - the prompt string to send
      responseListener - the listener to notify when the response is received

      Returns:
